oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lone Rock in Bon Air, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of tracks on "Lone Rock" in Bon Air, Tennessee. Writing on the front of the postcard reads "'Lone Rock' looking north / Bon Air. Tenn. / Still Photo." Features a divided back and handwritten correspondence on reverse. Aug. 28, 1908 postmark.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Railroad tracks; Rock formations; Plants
